title: Queen of Ice: Frozen & Freaky: An Adult Fairy Tale (Book 2)
features: Queen of Ice Frozen & Freaky: An Adult Fairy Tale (Book 2)14,000 wordsI ran, blowing across mountaintops like a blizzard’s gust. Finally free to live a life of my own choosing, I did all the naughty things I’d always dreamed of. A castle of ice leapt from my fingertips, and manly ice servants catered to my every need. There was nothing more a girl could want. Well...almost nothing. I wasn’t immune to loneliness, no matter what I told myself. I would’ve given anything to see my sister again. To my shock, she would arrive with a guest. I warned her to leave me be. I didn’t mean for my power to hurt her again, I truly didn’t. Sadly, I’d soon discover…Annika was the least of my problems.Warning: This 14,000 word adult fairy tale contains graphic language, erotic situations, and is a story for adults (18+).
description: Ana Lynne writes erotic short stories featuring many topics, such as, adult fairy tales, stepbrothers, taboo fetishes and other fun and edgy subjects. Ana's goal is to create a package of descriptive sex and entertaining story in a quick-read experience.
